msgEffectSet: @{username}, The lights are now set to {effect} for {seconds} seconds. Thanks for your bits tip! 😀
msgAddedToQueue: @{username}, Thank you for your bit tip! The lights will soon be lit up with your bit tip. You are currently number {position} in the queue. I will message you when it starts!
msgEffectNotFound: @{username}, the lights don't have that effect. Please check your spelling. Thank you for your bit donation tho! ❤️
msgUnderMinimumBitAmount: @{username}, only bit donations larger than 100 bits will trigger the lights. Thank you so much for the donation tho!
